alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 13 at 9:51PM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Southern Wayne, Bradford, Susquehanna, Pike, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Wyoming and Northern Wayne counties. In New York, Tompkins, Chemung, Schuyler, Steuben, Tioga, Broome, Yates, Seneca and Southern Cayuga counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the bitterly cold wind chills overnight, temperatures on Saturday are expected to only warm to between 10 to 15 degrees and then quickly fall back to near zero overnight Sunday night. This will be a prolonged period under very cold conditions. This could lead to pipes freezing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
